Package net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

Class AbstractCommand

  • Object
    • AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command, Resettable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleCommand
    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends Object
implements Command
    An abstract implementation of the Command interface that stores all lines output to the process' standard out and standard error in response to the command.
    Author:
    Viktor Csomor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected AbstractCommand​(String instruction)
      Constructs an instance holding the specified instruction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ProcessOutputStore getCommandOutputStore()
      Returns the process output store containing the process' output in response to the command.
      String getInstruction()
      Returns the instruction to send to the process.
      boolean isCompleted​(String outputLine, boolean error)
      A method called every time a new line is printed to the standard out or standard error stream of the process after the command is sent to its standard in stream until true is returned or a FailedCommandException is thrown.
      protected abstract boolean isExecutionCompleted​(String outputLine, boolean error)
      It allows for the processing of the output and is responsible for determining whether the output line denotes the completion of the execution of the command.
      void reset()
      It resets the instance, in case it is stateful, to a state practically identical to its initial state.

      • AbstractCommand

        protected AbstractCommand​(String instruction)
        Constructs an instance holding the specified instruction.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the instruction is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandOutputStore

        public ProcessOutputStore getCommandOutputStore()
        Returns the process output store containing the process' output in response to the command.
        Returns:
        The output store used to capture to process' output in response to the command.

      • isExecutionCompleted

        protected abstract boolean isExecutionCompleted​(String outputLine,
                                                boolean error)
                                         throws FailedCommandException
        It allows for the processing of the output and is responsible for determining whether the output line denotes the completion of the execution of the command.
        Parameters:
        outputLine - The new line of output printed to the standard out of the process.
        error - Whether this line has been output to the standard error or to the standard out stream.
        Returns:
        Whether the output denotes the completion of the command's execution.
        Throws:
        FailedCommandException - If the output denotes the process has finished processing the command and the command failed.

      • getInstruction

        public String getInstruction()
        Description copied from interface: Command
        Returns the instruction to send to the process.
        Specified by:
        getInstruction in interface Command
        Returns:
        The instruction to write to the process' standard in.

      • isCompleted

        public final boolean isCompleted​(String outputLine,
                                 boolean error)
                          throws FailedCommandException
        Description copied from interface: Command
        A method called every time a new line is printed to the standard out or standard error stream of the process after the command is sent to its standard in stream until true is returned or a FailedCommandException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        isCompleted in interface Command
        Parameters:
        outputLine - The new line of output printed to the standard out of the process.
        error - Whether this line has been output to the standard error or to the standard out stream.
        Returns:
        Whether this line of output denotes that the process has finished processing the command.
        Throws:
        FailedCommandException - If the output denotes the process has finished processing the command and the command failed. The process is to be considered ready for executing new submissions after this exception is thrown.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: Resettable
        It resets the instance, in case it is stateful, to a state practically identical to its initial state.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface Resettable
